nodes.text: The HyperMatter Engineering Facility was a facility in the Black Hole, a hypermatter refinery on the planet Corellia. During the Galactic War, Galactic Republic forces freed the facility's captive engineers from the Coronas gang.

The HyperMatter Engineering Facility is the site of the Republic mission "Forced Labor," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.1 along with the rest of the Black Hole.
